content: अचेतन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Inanimate, not sentient, irrational; चेतन °नेषु <ls>Me. 5</ls>; °नं ब्रह्म inanimate Brahma; °नं नाम गुणं न लक्षयेत् <ls>Ś. 6. 12</ls> destitute of life, lifeless (object &c.); °नेष्वपि चेतनावपदुचारः <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--2@} Not conscious, insensible; senseless; बुद्धिशतमचेतने नष्टं <ls>H. 2. 161.</ls>
